content: I am trying to enter ballot reconcilliation comments for the Sep21 sIRB ballot, but I don't believe I have the right permissions in Jira in order to group and enter the comments- all I can do is follow them. It may be connected to the group hl7-trusted-users which I am not a part of? Thanks.
@James Topping Are you a co-chair or designated work group facilitator?

@Lloyd McKenzie No, just the facilitator for sIRB. I though the process is that I addressed the comments with a proposal, and then working group would review/discuss/make any changes and then eventually vote. Do I just need to provide the input for someone else to enter?
If a work group has asked you to help manage Jira issues on their behalf, then have a co-chair send me an email or PM asking for you to be added as an "hl7-trusted-user".
Also, you should read through the documentation here and here
